steps.title: Design and build

testimonials.title: You do not need another deck. You need something live.

items.name: Founder, B2B SaaS
items.quote: Mode forced us to cut our idea in half and ship something simple. That is why we are talking to paying users now.

items.name: Partner, marketing agency
items.quote: We had been stuck for months trying to productize a service. In two weeks we had a working AI tool clients could log into.

items.name: Solo creator
items.quote: It felt like adding a product team without hiring. Clear scope, fast decisions, zero fluff.

items.question: Who is Mode for?
items.answer: Founders and teams who already feel a specific problem and want a sharp MVP to test it, not a full platform.

items.question: Do you take equity?
items.answer: No by default. We work on clear fixed pricing. In rare cases we can discuss a small equity component.

items.question: What do you need from us?
items.answer: A short written brief and a 60 minute kickoff call. Most collaboration after that is async.

items.question: What happens after the sprint?
items.answer: You keep the product, code and accounts. We can hand over to your team or line up another sprint.
